author: Jamie Boudreau
description: Rye whiskey tamed and flavoured by elderflower, Punt E Mes and maraschino.
name: Phish Hook
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass
